nodes.text: Flybane was a commander in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, Flybane aided Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Jedi Master Tanis during a battle on the planet Ryloth. In the midst of the fight, Skywalker recorded a holographic transmission, requesting aid from the Republic, but he was spotted by a Confederate battle droid in the process. As Skywalker charged to attack the droid, he told Flybane and Master Tanis to keep close. Ultimately, the Republic won the battle.

Commander Flybane received a brief mention in holorecord made by Anakin Skywalker that served as promotional material for the video game Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes and was posted on September 14, 2009 on the LucasArts website. However, Flybane did not appear in the game itself.
